notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: T.J.-C. and M.D.l.O.-A., original draft preparation, drafted the figures and tables, performed bibliographic research; M.D.l.O.-A., C.V.-G., O.A.J.-M., J.A.G.-S. and T.A.U.-H. wrote the manuscript and formal analysis; M.B. and T.J.-C. conceived the topic, wrote the manuscript and retrieved the funding. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
